description: This waterproof-breathable jacket is built for storms ahead. This waterproof-breathable jacket is built for the storms ahead thanks to a sealed seams on the hood and shoulders, plus a drawcord-adjustable hood. Elastic cuffs and hem give you a snug and secure way to block out even more rain.
name: Columbia Sportswear Lava Canyon Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Universal, easy fit for comfortable range of motion
